summary: Relating to and establishing an Office of International Affairs in the Executive Department; providing for the appointment of a Director thereof and defining duties; providing for the organization and specifying the functions of said Office; establishing, retitling and reclassifying certain positions therein; amending the Seattle Municipal code by adding thereto a new Subchapter IX to Chapter 3.14; establishing a budget therefor by reappropriation and transfer and by appropriation from the Emergency fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
